titleInfo.title: Ein einfaches Verfahren zur Alkylierung von Arylalkinen

mods.abstract: Arylalkynes are alkylated in a rapid reaction and under mild conditions by alkyl iodides in the presence of powdered KOH and 18-crown-6.
